Barkskin.Name: Barkskin
Barkskin.Description: The skin of the caster is transformed into a rough, bark-like hide. This makes the caster less vulnerable to weapons, but more vulnerable to fire.

QuickenSelf.Name: Quicken Self
QuickenSelf.Description: Quickness increases the speed of the caster and enhances his ability to dodge and evade incoming attacks. The quickened one can perform regular combat actions twice every turn, but still cannot cast more than one spell per combat round.
